definition: the prime of one's life/youthful years
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime

sentences.english: People with long commutes tend to die younger.
sentences.chinese: 那些通勤時間較長的人也傾向於“英年早逝”。

sentences.english: The reason why he died young was his inattention to health.
sentences.chinese: 他英年早逝的原因是他不注意自己的健康。

sentences.english: Pity is Hou Yaowen died so young.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是侯耀文英年早逝。

sentences.english: The study of geosciences in NE Asia suffers heavy loss because of their death.
sentences.chinese: 他們的英年早逝，對東北亞地學研究是一個重大損失。

sentences.english: I have lived with the prospect of an early death for the last 49 years.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的49年裏，我隨時可能已經英年早逝。

sentences.english: The mysterious circumstances surrounding his early death at the age of 53 have 20)given rise to a great deal of speculation.
sentences.chinese: 而他在53歲時神祕的英年早逝更是引起了各種猜測。

sentences.english: Disease cut Smith off in the best part of life.
sentences.chinese: 病魔使風華正茂的史密斯英年早逝。

sentences.english: Ryan Giggs is "totally devastated" by the news that Gary Speed has died at the age of 42.
sentences.chinese: 吉格斯被斯必德42歲英年早逝的消息完全驚呆了。

sentences.english: Both Mr Tsang and Mr Tang are tipped as forerunners in the race for the next chief executive.
sentences.chinese: 曾蔭權和唐英年都被視爲下屆特首的熱門人選。

sentences.english: He revolted against the principles and norms of his time, he died young and he was a libertine," co-producer Albert Cohen said.
sentences.chinese: 他反抗當時的條條框框，還是個英年早逝的浪子。

sentences.english: The poet passed over early in life.

definition: to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
heaven is jealous of heroic genius (idiom); the great have great hardship to contend with/those whom the Gods love die young
to accumulate work causes sickness (idiom); to fall ill from constant overwork
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise/fig. to pass away (idiom)
to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to die/to depart this mortal coil
